name: Fifty Dollar Smash
description:
Description

You are trying to survive during an endless swarm. The goal is to survive as long as possible with the highest score. It doesn’t get easier. You will only be delaying the inevitable.

Controls Movement
  • W - Move up
  • A - Move left
  • S - Move down
  • D - Move right
Shooting
  • Up Arrow - Shoot up
  • Left Arrow - Shoot left
  • Down Arrow - Shoot down
  • Right Arrow - Shoot right
Shooting

Used C++ and Raylib
